Landing.description: ROAPORT is an innovative platform that enables citizens to report road hazards and infrastructure issues quickly and efficiently.
Landing.subDescription: Join thousands of users who are making roads safer for everyone by reporting potholes, broken traffic lights, and other hazards.
Landing.scanToDownload: Scan QR code with your phone camera to download the app
Landing.step1Description: Easily report hazards using your phone's camera and GPS.
Landing.step2Description: Our smart system quickly verifies the legitimacy of reports.
Landing.step3Description: See real-time updates as authorities address the issue.
Landing.step4Description: Contribute to making your city's infrastructure better for everyone.
Landing.feature1Description: Submit hazard reports in seconds with our intuitive mobile app.
Landing.feature2Description: View all reported hazards on a public map and monitor their status.
Landing.feature3Description: Machine learning helps ensure reports are genuine and correctly categorized.
Landing.feature4Description: Be part of the solution for safer roads and public spaces.

ScoreboardPage.title: Upload Scoreboard
ScoreboardPage.description: View the top uploaders and their scores

title: Hazard Report
description: Report and track hazards in your area
